name: Joystick Jeopardy
description:
Joystick Jeopardy

was created as a prototype for UI. This was the result after working through a course in C# for 2D games.  It was an excellent exercise where I learned to use arrays, UI Canvas, TextMeshPro, Sliders, and Sprite Swapping.  I look forward to putting these skills to use in future games.
